description:
After finding one of Kou’s childhood drawings, Fuu and her friends think it may be the same as her favorite picture of her father. They set out to discover the location with Sayomi`s help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If We All Walk Together, We`ll Be Happy, So Yeah
Minna de Arukeba Happy, na no de
みんなで歩けばハッピー, なので
